item.title:
“Tina Turner, the 'Queen of Rock'n Roll' has died peacefully today at the age of 83 after a long illness in her home in Kusnacht near Zurich, Switzerland. With her, the world loses a music legend and a role model.”
—A spokesperson for Tina Turner
: https://news.sky.com/story/tina-turner-dies-aged-83-12888593…
item.author: popcrave

item.title: Tina Turner has died at the age of 83.
item.author: popcrave

item.title:
“I was given the privilege of being really involved in the creation of this character and the ins and outs of how she expresses herself.”
— Lily-Rose Depp
item.author: popcrave

item.title:
Lily-Rose Depp defends the explicit portrayal of her character Jocelyn in HBO’s ‘THE IDOL’:
“Jocelyn is a born and bred performer - and I think that extends to every aspect of her life, not just her professional life. The way that she dresses, for example, is her trying to tell… Show more
item.author: popcrave

item.title:
The cast of #DragRaceMexico has been officially revealed.
The series premieres June 22 on Paramount+ in the U.S. and Latin America, and globally on WOW Presents Plus.
item.author: popcrave

item.title: Target pulls some LGBTQ+ merchandise from Pride collection following backlash from conservatives.
